typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'lineage',
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	wildcardPaths:['nytimes-covid.csv']) ~> sourceCSV
ModifyHeadingStyle select(mapColumn(
		Load_date,
		Load_time,
		Record_Date = Date,
		County,
		State,
		Fips,
		Cases,
		Deaths,
		Iso_country,
		Death_rate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropLineageColumn
sourceCSV derive(Load_time = substring(toString(currentTimestamp()), 12,25),
		Load_date = currentDate(),
		Iso_country = 'USA',
		Death_rate = concat(toString(round(multiply(divide(toFloat(deaths),toFloat(cases)),100),4)),'%')) ~> AddNewColumns
AddNewColumns select(mapColumn(
		each(patternMatch(`.*`),
			initCap($$) = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ModifyHeadingStyle
DropLineageColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkSynapse
